author: cmpilato
msg: Some preliminary work for Issue #1015 - binary property handling over ra_dav.

author: mbk
msg: Fix "svnadmin create on existing repository" issue.  Essentially,
apr_dir_is_empty() was returning whether or not the directory
could be accessed and read without error, not whether the directory
was empty.  In doing so, fix a very small filedescriptor leak.
(apr_dir_is_empty): Only return apr_err if an actual error has

author: ghudson
msg: Don't sleep for a full second for timestamps if we can sleep for less
to get to the next second.  This shaves 200 seconds off the current
(svn_sleep_for_timestamps): New function to sleep until the next
second, instead of sleeping for one full second.

author: rooneg
msg: As pointed out by Branko, it's kind of silly to have both public and private
defines for the same exact value.
(svn_config_ensure): use the new public defines instead of the old

author: dlr
msg: * subversion/bindings/swig/svn_types.i: Introduced new Java type mapping
svn_boolean_t to boolean. The mapping for svn_error_t now generates a
return statement in the generated JNI class, preventing a compile error.
* subversion/bindings/swig/svn_client.i: Changed the package names of Notifier
